name: items
description: This table contains all items that could be purchased by users. Note that only published items are available to website visitors (have value in the `published_at` column).

columns.name: vendor_id
columns.description: ID of a vendor who produces or sells this item in our E-commerce store.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when an item was first added to our E-commerce store.

columns.name: published_at
columns.description: Timestamp when an item was first available for purchasing.
